oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Norman Borlaug, Edwin Wellhausen, Timothy Reeves, Shivaji Pandey, Gregorio Martinez and Francisco Labastida are presents at the Sheraton Hotel in the international Symposium "The genetics and exploitation of heterosis in crops", from August 17th to 22th, 1997.
